Text: Gas Power Marketing Trading StudyI enjoyed meeting with you yesterday and discussing our Gas Power Marketing Trading Study We really hope that Enron is able to participate this year and we will work with you to address your concerns I believe that the problem last year was primarily due to concerns over releasing data in general and not our study in particular I am attaching an electronic copy of the latest version of the input sheet for the study It is far easier to read on a computer than in print Please remember that Enron does not need to answer every question to participate and that all results are reported back in a blinded format The only data points identified by company are the data points for the company values of the company receiving the report If you have any further questions regarding the report please do not hesitate to call John Stephenson or myself at Have a great weekend and thank you for your efforts to enable Enron to participate in this years study Sincerely Richard Murphy Input Sheetxls
